title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 255.1011 - Records an operator must keep
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 255.1011 - Records an operator must keep

State Regulations

An operator must maintain records demonstrating
compliance with the requirements of sections 255.1003 through
255.1015
of this Part for at least
10 years. The records must include copies of superseded GDPIM plans developed
under sections 255.1003 through
255.1015
of this

Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
255.1011

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
